mapper.select: SELECT mio.mio_input_id, m.m_no as mio_no, m.m_name as mio_name, mio.mio_input_Quantity, mio.mio_input_date FROM material_io mio, material m WHERE m.m_no = mio.mio_no
SELECT mio.mio_output_id, m.m_no as mio_no, m.m_name as mio_name, mio.mio_output_Quantity, mio.mio_output_date FROM material_io mio, material m WHERE m.m_no = mio.mio_no
